commands.start: Welcome ğŸ˜„ This bot is created to test Telegram payments. To test unreal payment, use the command: /invoice Use /help to more info about the bot.
commands.project: This project was created by @Muaath_5 ğŸ˜ This project is an open source project on GitHub under GPL 3.0 License For helping on translating this bot to your language, Contact with @Muaath_5
commands.inline: You can use send invoices via this bot in inline query ğŸ˜! Just use the button below
commands.help:
Use /start to get a little info about the bot.
Use /invoice to get a Test invoice, Don't worry, it's a test.
Use /inline to get info about inline queries.
Use /project to get the project source and can help in the project.
Use /help to get this menu again â˜º.
